questions.question: What is the function of the base in a transistor?

answers.a: Acts as the main power supply
answers.c: Controls the current between emitter and collector

questions.question: What type of transistor configuration provides the highest current gain?
What is the typical biasing condition for a transistor in active mode?

answers.b: Emitter-base junction forward-biased, collector-base junction reverse-biased
answers.d: Emitter-base junction reverse-biased, collector-base junction forward-biased

questions.question: Which of the following materials are commonly used to make transistors?
What does the term 'hFE' represent in a transistor?
